EngageManifest.Title: Prototype Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide's content at 960px wide by 350px tall.

This template features content displayed in a white frame with a subtle shadow below, and pagers at the bottom right.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Prototype, but can be used with any skin. The template was designed with fixed dimensions intentially; to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!

This template looks best with a large image as the slide's content. Only the slide's content is displayed (the image fields are ignored).
